In order to meet the research needs of researchers in humanities and social sciences, the NKU Library currently has collections of microfilm on nine subjects in History and Politics. To promote the use of the resources, we have them digitized and set up a special website to facilitate reader’s access to the collection.    Website: http://192.168.155.238/tc/home/tcindex.
